p: The expression of CD45, Ly6G, F4/80, CD11c, CD206, TCRb, CD4 and CD8 in the wound was evaluated by flow cytometry. The tissue collected at the moment of wound induction was denominated as Unwounded skin. Moreover, scar tissue from mice was collected in the different periods (3 and 10 days). After collection, tissues were washed twice in PBS, cleaved with scissors and dissociated by enzymatic digestion (40 U/mL of collagenase IV and 40 µg/mL of DNAse).
